title: Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers National Monument: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging           Click to see local area hotels and bed & breakfasts. Greene County Convention & Visitors Bureau  Even though no overnight lodging is available at Charles Young Buffalo Soldiers NM, there are ample amounts of overnight accommodations in and around the park in the Wilberforce and Xenia area that visitors can choose from.  Many recognizable chain hotels can be found in the Xenia.
